text: Underlying chronic medical conditions were reported for a total of 36 influenza PICU patients ( 76 . 6 % ) ( Table 3 ) . Chronic neurological diseases were most frequent ( 34 . 0 % ) , followed by chronic lung disease ( 25 . 5 % ) , preterm birth ( 21 . 3 % ) , cardiac malformations ( 17 . 0 % ) , obesity ( 10 . 6 % ) , genetic disorders ( 8 . 5 % ) , and immunocompromising conditions ( 8 . 5 % ) .
